Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufpr.dinf.gres.core.jmetal4.core.Problem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstrEx, Fonseca, Golinski, Griewank, IntRealProblem, Kursawe, OKA1, OKA2, OneMax, OPLA, Osyczka2, Poloni, Schaffer, Sphere, Srinivas, Tanaka, TSP, Viennet2, Viennet3, Viennet4, Water

    public abstract class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class representing a multiobjective optimization problem
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Stores the problem name

      Stores the type of the solutions of the problem

        protected int[] precision_
        Stores the number of bits used by binary-coded variables (e.g., BinaryReal variables). By default, they are initialized to DEFAULT_PRECISION)
